text:
In "Apache Service Monitor" -window a Double Click to Restart-button causes 
access violation error for Apache.exe (Dr Watson will help to shut down a 
prosess ;).
creator: tsoona@hotmail.com
tsoona@hotmail.com
text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> Is this still reproducible in 2.0.53?
Seems that this behaviour is gone from version 2.0.52 and 2.0.53: tested on XP
SP2  . So this seems to be fixed.
